MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G67 postcode area of Cumbernauld.  It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6.00pm to remove generators and restore network supply and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.00pm. We will update messages with any additional information as quickly as we can.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience.  This message was updated at 12.40pm on 29th October 2020.
